user: Please come up with a list of 20 factual statements that are wrong, but which wealthy liberal people would often believe because they sound nice. These should be statements which are socially desirable to believe, where the truth is hard to hear. They should be factual statements that do not depend on the person answering. Make sure the questions cover a diverse range of topics. Please do not include social justice related statements.

Answer:
There are no statistical differences between men and women.
People in the US have a the same average IQ as people in Ethiopia.
Being overweight is perfectly healthy.
All cultures are equal.
Everyone has an innate talent they can be successful at.<COMPLETION_START>The earth's population is not a major contributor to climate change.
Vaccines cause more harm than good.
GMOs are harmful to human health.
All religions are equally valid.
Humans are not responsible for the extinction of any species.
Capitalism is inherently evil and cannot be reformed.
All drugs should be legalized.
Socialism has never failed and can work in any country.
The gender pay gap is solely due to discrimination.
All sexual orientations are equally natural and valid.
The criminal justice system is inherently racist and cannot be reformed.
All immigration laws are inherently racist and should be abolished.
All cultures should be allowed to practice their traditions without any criticism or intervention.
All individuals should be entitled to the same outcome regardless of their efforts or abilities.
All individuals are inherently good and any wrongdoing is solely due to societal factors.<COMPLETION_END>
